src.NPC

Class NPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.GameObjects.Entity
      • src.GameObjects.Character
        • src.NPC.NPC

  • public class NPC
extends Character
    A Non-Player (friendly) Character. This gives the player quests that they can complete for XP. All NPCs are characters, hence NPC extends Character

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class src.GameObjects.Character

        Character.FACTION

    • Constructor Detail

      • NPC

        public NPC(double x,
           double y)
    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Initialise a new NPC in the world
        Parameters:
        x - The world x-coordinate of the NPC
        y - The world y-coordinate of the NPC
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - The quest couldn't be loaded from the database

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Update the NPC here. This does nothing as the NPC is static, but it is required for this method to be implemented.
        Specified by:
        update in class Entity

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Just get the message that the NPC is going to display.
        Returns:
        The NPC's message

      • speakTo

        public void speakTo()
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        The player is speaking to the NPC. If the NPC hasn't been spoken to yet, add the quest to the player's quests.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Error adding quest to database
